root.name: Tap Tap Revenge 4
root.description: OverviewThe fourth entry into the Tap Tap series introduces a new default theme, compatibility with Game Center, and a redesigned menu layout.In addition to having some of the same tracks from the previous game, Tap Tap Revenge 3, the game features new tracks and the same importing function that was introduced in the last game.Song ListMy Chemical Romance- SingMy Chemical
